label: AnimalCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of specified certificate.

objectProperties.comment: An animal certification applicable to this animal certificate.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

referencedBy.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.
